title: Intensive Course on Multivariable Calculus Instructional Design for Pre-Service Teachers (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basics of single-variable calculus and familiarity with fundamental linear algebra concepts
context.additional_context: Design optimized for smartphone-based learning for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Can explain concepts of multivariable limits, differentiation, and integration with ≥85% accuracy
Can identify and apply ≥3 personalized/collaborative learning strategies suitable for learners
Can present advanced topics like covector fields and Stokes' theorem with visual aids
Can design ≥2 effective online mathematics teaching methods in resource-constrained environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
